div.p:
Vertical profiles of zonal‐mean temperature differences for each of the prescribed‐ozone simulations relative to UKCA: SPEC‐ZM (a, d), SPEC‐AZ (b, e), and CALC‐AZ (c, f). The top row shows these differences during December through March (to show the wintertime polar vortex) and the bottom row during April through June (to show the final warming). Color shading is only present when changes are statistically significant at the 95% confidence interval. Overlaid are Eliassen‐Palm flux vector differences, scaled by
1/ ρ 0 , with the vertical component scaled by an additional
5 πr e/756 km to more accurately depict the orientation of the vectors in the frame. The solid and dashed contours are analogous to those in Figure 2. NH = Northern Hemisphere.
